step_data.thought: I'm having issues with the `send_msg_to_user` action, possibly due to escaping characters in the message. Looking at the current page, I can see that I've successfully navigated to the details page for the catalog price rule "20% off all Women's and Men's Pants". The page shows all the relevant information about this rule, including its name, description, active status, applicable websites, customer groups, and priority. Since I've already completed the task of viewing the details of this catalog price rule, I'll try one more time to send a message to the user with a simpler message that avoids special characters.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully accessed the details page for the catalog price rule. The rule is currently active, applies to the Main Website, and is configured for multiple customer groups including NOT LOGGED IN, Regular Customers Updated, Wholesale, and Retailer. The rule has a priority of 0 and includes sections for Conditions and Actions.')
